Text:
"you could remove  the vocal from a  stereo track by
subtracting the left channel from the right." - I implore you, name one sane mix where that works!:D

"name one sane mix where that works"

Most Beatle songs that haven't been compressed.

Music A on right, Music B on left, Vocals centered and placed into right and left tracks at equal amplitude.

Maybe not on Revolution 9, but then Yoko was main-lining cottage cheese into John.
